sentences.english: That night, they are too excited to go to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 这一夜，两人都兴奋的失眠。

sentences.english: Insomnia is both a symptom and a cause of depression and anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 失眠既是一种症状又是导致沮丧和紧张的肇因。

sentences.english: Last night I stayed awaked in bed.
The percentage of people suffering loss of sleep and hearing loss is very high.
sentences.chinese: 遭受失眠和听障的人的比例很高。

sentences.english: Well above the five ways to answer a psychogenic insomnia how governance issues.
sentences.chinese: 以上五种方法很好地解答了心因性失眠怎样治的问题。

sentences.english: Ron Artest is dyslexic, agnostic, and an insomniac.
sentences.chinese: 阿泰是一个朗诵困难者，不可知论者和失眠患者。

sentences.english: Athens insomnia scale were used to assess preoperative sleep situation of the patients.
sentences.chinese: 采用阿森斯失眠量表评估患者术前睡眠情况。

sentences.english: But those that have adapted to living in caves lack eyes. What they do have is insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 但穴居鱼则没有眼睛，而且患有失眠症。

sentences.english: Shortchanging that break can be a recipe for insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 这样的休息可以作为治疗失眠的药方。

sentences.english: Why I most putrid into old insomnia?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我最进老失眠馁？

sentences.english: Financial stress and odd-hour work shifts can play roles in sleeplessness, too, Chervin added.
sentences.chinese: 谢尔文还指出，经济压力以及轮班制也会导致失眠。

sentences.english: I read that most insomniacs are people who go to bed when they aren't sleepy.
sentences.chinese: 我了解的失眠者是那些躺在床上无法入睡的人。

sentences.english: ConclusionThe silver spike point therapy has the better curative effect on insomnia than Clonopin.
sentences.chinese: 结论低周波治疗仪治疗失眠症的疗效优于氯硝西泮。

sentences.english: Four out of five people with insomnia sleep better at night without naps.
sentences.chinese: 患失眠的5人钟有4人都感到不午休晚上睡得更香。

sentences.english: After all, he said to hilf, it's probably only insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 到头来，他对说，大概又只是失眠。

sentences.english: So what exactly are the culprits that make insomnia one menacing sleeping problem ?
sentences.chinese: 究竟凶徒使失眠问题之一来势汹汹睡觉？

definition: to stay up late or all night
sleep/to sleep/(computing) to enter sleep mode
